reviewText: Everything I could have ever wanted! You get to see the whole concert, including ments and VCRs. And the making-of video was unexpectedly fantastic for so short a length. The photo book is nice, too. Only downsides: they edited out Tao, even in the audio when they could, and there are no English captions.

This is a great product for anyone who loves EXO. The photobook is more of a collection of postcards than an actual photobook, so you have to be really careful when flipping through it in order to not tear any out. Anyways, it arrived on time and in perfect condition!

I love this concert and this band so I was willing to pay extra because of that. I guess I should have read more info about it because what came was not what I was expecting. In a good way. There is way more to it than a two discs. And I was so excited when I got it only to be wonderfully surprised with the extras. The pages are perforated so you can detach them and hang them or whatever you want and they're made of thick card stock. Definitely good quality. I wish the concert came with English subtitles, I love it anyway. Definitely worth the money. -dcox
i got it and we love it thank you
EXO is the best group. I love everything about them.

Came in perfect condition! Only thing is I thought it came with the mouse pad like they were being sold with in the very beginning with the DVDs. Guess I should have asked before hand! >.< Other then that, it came pretty quick and the DVD's box was perfect. No dents or nothing. I was a little worried about that. Would recommend to anyone who is thinkin' of buying this concert DVD! Brings both CDs and the photobook inside is amazing!!
came in perfect condition and is amazing
Awesome,EXO L's this should not be missing from your collection!!! Full of photos and they are all signed by all members,  Package was great,
